basics.name: Connor Freeman
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Working for the past year with national oraganizations and individuals as a freelance web developer and consultant, with a track record of on-time and on-budget projects. Looking to work where I can bring immediate value and develop my skill-set further. Preferably with a team that values security, usability, strategy, and finds enjoyment in building a good product.

work.summary: My work has covered a variety of projects and services, consulting with individuals starting an eCommerce business to working with internal teams at advertising and design agencies. I excel at bridging the gap between design, development, and business strategy. Understanding of business goals helps translate into the success of my work.

Working with a team of developers, designers, and account managers to build custom websites for multi-family real estate apartment properties all over the world. My job included working with designers to create responsive, mobile friendly websites that connect with backend databases to show current apartment listings for prospective renters. I also helped develop and manage an agile workflow to delegate tasks and assign code review for the other developers on the team.
highlights: Developed an in-house build-system using composer comprised of a custom WordPress application architecture, custom reusable templates, gulp task runner, and a deploy process. This increased productivity with code reuse and streamlined on-boarding of new team members.
Built interactive maps using Google Maps API to highlight businesses nearby an apartment location.
Created interactive floorplans for apartments with pricing details from an availability API.

work.summary: I began as an intern over the summer of 2011 and learned a lot about web development. I helped manage dozens of applications on both frontend and backend. I was invited to return the following summer as a developer to work on projects of my own.
highlights: Front-end developer for Ruby on Rails application
Maintain client inventory databases in PostgreSQL and MySQL

work.summary: I worked part-time during school to manage the website and internal services. Part of my job was creating new calendar events for their conferences, I did this by automation testing with Selenium. This dramatically reduced time and cost for the business. It gave me free time to build internal services like a purchase order tracking system.

references.name: Marq Sanchez
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
